long_description: The lightweight, strong, and endlessly versatile 64 in. Nite Ize Gear Tie is a reusable rubber twist tie that makes short work of extra-large wrapping, bundling and securing jobs. Constructed of a sturdy, bendable interior wire and durable, waterproof rubberlike exterior that won't scratch or mark. Extra-large size makes it great for securing loads to car roof racks, wrapping uneven bundles, attaching packs to rolling luggage and anchoring large items in truck beds. Waterproof and safe for use in fresh water or saltwater without damage; UV resistance stands up to extended sun exposure. Tough thermoplastic elastomer shell provides excellent grip; use indoors and outdoors in any weather.
short_description: The lightweight, strong, and endlessly versatile 64 in. Nite Ize Gear Tie is a reusable rubber twist tie that makes short work of extra-large wrapping, bundling and securing jobs.
